about_the_game:
Drag Her! Failure to Launch Edition is us turning our lemons into gay ass lemonade and sharing our highly-acclaimed, highly-unpublishable fighting game with you all. She's fast, she's frenetic, she's a 2D fighter featuring real drag stars duking it out to find the true top in a world full of bottoms.

Fight your friends, neighbors, enemies, and she-roes (sometimes all at once with 4-player mode). The only thing you can't fight is the inevitable foreclosure of your game studio.


  • Alaska 5000: An alien from Planet Glamtron, this strange and striking diva is known for her humor, her anus, and for the fact that, this is her hair, she don’t wear wigs.
  • Kim Chi: A 7 foot tall anime character, this Korean queen showed us that beauty comes in a towering and tantalizing package.
  • Laganja Estranja: From her splits to god’s ears, Laganja Estranja showed us all that marijuana wasn’t just a downer, it was also a come-upper.


  • Destroy your bestie/partner/enemy-to-lover in local versus mode
  • Fight anyone, anywhere with our online multiplayer rollback* netcode! (*backrolls not included)
  • Pregame a fun night out at the club with our round-robin 4 player mode
  • Lab with the girls in our training room, replete with frame data

content_descriptors.notes: Drag Her! contains frequent mentions of adult humor, sexual innuendo, and lewd behavior. Drag Her! also contains infrequent mentions of alcohol and drug use.

name: Drag Her!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Drag Her! Failure to Launch Edition is a skinny version of our fast, fabulous and frenetic 2D fighter. Featuring a roster of real-life drag royalty, including the iconic Alaska 5000, Kim Chi & Laganja Estranja.
